Set.Text: Each source of [ICON_RES_GOLD] Gold, [ICON_RES_SILVER] Silver, and [ICON_RES_COPPER] Copper worked by this City produces +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have at least one of these resources mined nearby.

The Mint can only be constructed in a city with improved [ICON_RES_GOLD] Gold, [ICON_RES_SILVER] Silver, or [ICON_RES_COPPER] Copper resources nearby. The Mint increases the [ICON_GOLD] Gold output of each such resource the city has access to.

+15% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production when building Land Units.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each source of [ICON_RES_IRON] Iron and [ICON_RES_COPPER] Copper worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have a mined source of one of these resources nearby.
The Forge can only be constructed in a city with an improved source of [ICON_RES_IRON] Iron or [ICON_RES_COPPER] Copper nearby. It increases the speed at which the city produces land units.
